lines: Moeti o teng monyako; Bu. . .la kene(bulela Jesu)
Ke khale A eme teng bulela Jesu, Mo bu’ele A e-s’o fete.(bulela Jesu)
Jesu ngoana’ Molimo, ’mo bulele a kene ’Bu. . .le. . .le. . .
.U bule pelo ea hao mo bulele, ha U lieha O tla feta,(bulela Jesu)
Mo...bulele, O ntsa eme monyako, Oho tiiisetsa thabong,(bulela Jesu)
A lule ka ho uena mo... bu...le...le(bulela Jesu)
Utloa ha A nts’a qeka, mo...bu...lele, joale U khethe Eena(bulela Jesu)
Mo...bulele, O nts’a eme monyako, Oho tiisetsa thabong,(bulela Jesu)
Mo rorise hle Eena, mo bulele...(bulela Jesu)
Mo amohele joale, mo...bulele, O tla etsa mokete,(bulela Jesu)
Mo...bulele, U tla be U ts’oareloe, ho tlosoe tsa lefats’e(bulela Jesu)
